response.overview: The SPASM Festival returns to haunt your nights with 11 new Quebec horror short films!  SPASM guarantees you thrills by presenting the most horrific, the most outrageous, and the funniest works in Quebec. Experience the full SPASM Festival by watching short films interspersed with hilarious Night Shift sketches.  Fans will rediscover the classic Terror by Izabel Grondin, while genre enthusiasts will discover award-winning films from the 2005 SPASM Festival: Alex Vampire Slayer by Al Kratina (Jury Prize) and Head by François Gauthier (Special Mention for Most Gore).
response.title: Festival SPASM Horreur Vol. 2
